English: Aboard a helicopter, above the sea
Southern Malden
Malden up ahead! Two minutes till the drop!
One minute till the drop!
Thirty seconds! Get ready!
Entering the drop zone in ten seconds, Leonid! You have green light!
Sergey, are you awake? Sergey?!
Of course, Igor. I was just lost in thought.
We are close to the island, friend. We are close to ending it all.

Leonid squad, heads up! We are entering undisputed enemy territory for the first time! The island of Malden is the enemy base of operations!\nIt is their last possesion in the area and they are going to put up a tough fight defending it!
We are paradropping behind enemy lines! While our comrades in boats are going to be storming the beaches, we are to disrupt the enemy rear and hold out until we are reinforced!
It is not going to be easy, but we've been through worse before! I count on each and every one of you to continue doing what you do best! Let Leonid carry the day once more!
Check your equipment and fear not! I'll see you on the ground!
Get ready, comrades! On my mark!
Go, go, go! This is it, comrades! Keep going, go, go!
You've arrived just in time, comrades. They almost got to me before you did.
Nikolay, is that you? Are you hurt?
Hello, Sergey, dear friend. It seems you saved my life and made us even.
This is the second time you courted death, Nikolay. You should be more careful!
Death comes for all of us, friend. If the third time is going to be my last, I am ready for that.
Alright, Nikolay, you're rambling. I need to report this in.
Medics are on their way. Stay put, Nikolay, you're going to be alright.
Go, Sergey, I am fine. And thank you.
I'll find you after the battle. See you soon.
GOOD LUCK, LEONID, WE'RE RETURNING TO THE BASE.
BAZA TO LEONID, MAKE HASTE AND PICK UP THAT CRASHED PILOT. THE ENEMY IS ON HIS WAY TO HIM. BAZA OUT.
BORIS TO LEONID, WE'RE PARADROPPING IN THE WEST DROP ZONE. THE ROAD IS FULL OF ENEMY TRUCKS, THEY'RE MOVING IN REINFORCEMENTS ALREADY!
UNDERSTOOD, BORIS. TAKE IT SLOWLY, WE STILL NEED TO GET TO THAT PILOT. TRY TO GET CLOSE TO THE TOWN, BUT DON'T ATTACK YET. WE'LL KEEP IN TOUCH. OVER.
GOT IT, LEONID. GOOD LUCK. OUT.
ON ME, LEONID!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, LANDING FORCES ARE CLOSING IN ON MALDEN, THEY ARE GOING TO ATTACK IN TEN MINUTES. BAZA OUT.
LEONID GREEN TO LEONID, ALL QUIET OVER HERE. WE'RE MOVIGN TOWARDS THE MAIN ROAD. OVER.
LEONID RED TO LEONID, ENEMY PATROLS ARE ADVANCING FROM THE SOUTHERN ROAD. ENGAGING. OVER.
LEONID BLACK TO LEONID, WE'RE RIGHT BESIDE YOU COVERING YOUR LEFT FLANK. OVER.
LEONID TO OTHERS, AFFIRMITIVE. ENEMY UNITS ARE COMING FROM CHAPOI, BEWARE! WE'RE GOING FOR THE PILOT, OUT.
LEONID TO BAZA, WE SEE THE CRASHED PLANE IN THE DISTANCE. WE'RE MOVING OVER. OUT.
THE PLANE'S A TOAST. NO SIGN OF SURVIVORS.
COMRADE RASHIV, A RED SMOKE IN THAT TREELINE ON THE LEFT!
THAT MUST BE THE PILOT, HURRY!
LEONID TO BAZA, WE GOT TO THE PILOT AND HE'S SAFE, BUT WOUNDED. I NEED MEDIC AND EVACUATION, OVER.
A MEDIC TEAM IS ON ITS WAY TO YOU. YOU'VE DONE WELL, LEONID, CONTINUE ON YOUR MISSION, THE LANDIGS ARE ABOUT TO START. BAZA OUT.
EVERYONE ON ME, WE NEED TO GET TO CHAPOI!
BAZA TO ANTON AND LEONID, THE LANDINGS HAVE BEGUN. OUR TROOPS ARE ATTACKING THE BEACHES. MOVE IN, BAZA OUT.
LEONID TO ANTON, WE'RE IN POSITION AND GOING IN, OVER.
ANTON UNDERSTOOD. WE'LL SEE YOU IN THE CITY! OUT.
LEONID TO LEONID BLACK, FORWARD, COMRADES! OVER.
WE HEAR YOU, COMRADE RASHIV, WE'RE ATTACKING! OUT.
WE ARE ENTERING THE CITY. SPREAD OUT AND CLEAR OUT THE STREETS!
LEONID TO BAZA, WE'VE TAKEN CHAPOI. THE ENEMY IS RETREATING, OVER.
OUR VICTORY IS ASSURED, LEONID. WE'RE SENDING IN MORE UNITS AND EQUIPMENT. HOLD YOUR POSITIONS UNTIL THEY ARRIVE. VERY GOOD WORK, COMRADES, WE MADE THE FIRST STEP TOWARDS TOTAL VICTORY! BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, GERTRUDA BEACH HAS BEEN SEIZED. OUR UNITS ARE ADVANCING ON CANCON. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, VILEN BEACH HAS BEEN SEIZED. OUR UNITS ARE SUPPORTING THE ATACK ON LA RIVIERE. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, KIM BEACH HAS BEEN TAKEN. OUR UNITS ARE DIVERTED EAST TO HELP WITH THE REMAINING BEACH POINTS. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, CANCON IS UNDER OUR CONTROL. OUR UNITS ARE MOVING FURTHER NORTH TOWARDS CHAPOI. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, REVMIR AND REVMIRA BEACHES WERE FINALLY TAKEN. OUR UNITS ARE MOVING IN TO SECURE THE MAIN ROAD. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, LE PORT HAS BEEN TAKEN. OUR UNITS ARE ADVANCING ALONG THE MAIN ROAD. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, LA RIVIERE HAS FALLEN, OUR UNITS ARE SECURING THE NORTHERN ROAD. THE LAST REMAINING TOWN OF CHAPOI IS SOON TO BE TAKEN AS WE ARE ADVANCING FROM ALL SIDES. BAZA OUT.
LEONID RED TO LEONID, THE EASTERN LANDINGS ARE HAVING DIFFICULTIES, WE ARE ASKED FOR SUPPORT, OVER.
MOVE AND SUPPORT THEM, LEONID RED. WE ARE FINE OVER HERE AND THE ROAD IS COVERED BY LEONID GREEN. OUT.
LEONID RED TO LEONID, THE EASTERN ROAD IS CLEAR. LE PORT DEFENCES ARE CRUMBLING AND OUR UNITS ARE CLOSE TO CAPTURING THE TOWN. OUT.
ANTON TO LEONID, MORE REINFORCEMENTS ARE COMING FROM THE WEST HEADING FOR LA RIVIERE AND CHAPOI. EXPECT ENEMY UNITS COMING FROM THAT DIRECTION, OUT.

Drop Zone West
Drop Zone East

PARADROP ONTO THE ISLAND OF MALDEN
INVESTIGATE CRASH SITE
SEIZE THE TOWN OF CHAPOI
RESCUE THE PILOT
